title: FenixS
author: FenixS
created_time: June 08, 2022, 10:43:29 AMLast edit: June 09, 2022, 09:20:44 AM by FenixS
content: Hi,I'm tired of scammers advertising their paid signals groups with made up unverified trading results. I guess most of their trades don't exist or they hide their unprofitable trades and only brag about successful ones. There was a time I was subscribing stock market trading signal service until I noticed that the signals and reports are not as profitable as advertised by the service "guru". I'm aware that signal trading is full of scams, but I believe that there are some people who have good experience in trading, specialize in a niche e.g. agricultural commodities or metaverse and achieve better investment results in their niche than others. And are willing to share their trades for extra money.That is why I started to work on a signal trading platform with two groups of people:1) Traders can register and share their trade signals. The main difference is that they share trade signals on the platform, so the platform exactly knows the timing and the profit of the signal. There is also no manipulation of the trade price, because the exact price is taken from the current market data, not typed in by the trader. E.g. if the trader buys Apple stock or Ethereum, the platform checks the current price of that asset, sends the signal to subscribed users and saves it in database. When the trader sells it, the platform knows the exact profit of the trade.2) People can join and subscribe to Traders's signals. They see their REAL, VERIFIED results and there is no manipulation, no hiding bad trades, no time difference between the trade and alert sent, etc. Everything is clear as day. Of course those people pay some fee to subscribe to trades, but at least they know exactly what they are paying for.What do you guys think about such a platform? What are pros and cons? Of course I'm thinking about improving it in the future (adding reviews, traders can add reports, presentations etc.) but I wanted to get some feedback before starting further development. Would you be willing to join it for beta-testing?All feedback is welcome.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: The best I can tell you is to avoid data manipulate that give the impression that the result of your trades or signals is profitable, put the real results and share the old evidence even if it leads to losses.In the beginning it will be impossible to trust you and therefore this information must be free, verifiable, and linked to currencies with high market capacities and preferably only Bitcoin.The more people visit your site, the more data you will gain, and if you deal with that data with an analysis, you will get more accurate results.Stay away from all forms of fraud or profit from users or false recommendations.Profits will come in the future after you gain an audience and then you can add more currencies and the profit will be from advertisements.Your credibility and truth data is the key to your profits.

comments.body: Quote from: FenixS on June 08, 2022, 10:43:29 AMIf you did all of that then you would at least gain the trust of those which may like to use such platform as you are revealing the real results the traders get, however there is a reason scammers are so successful and keep deceiving people over and over again, and that is because people look for extraordinary results, which most of the time means inflating or even falsifying the real results traders can get, so I would not be surprised if not many people wanted to use your platform as your traders will offer less accuracy and profits even if the results are real.
